Lines: Cards with the #yEquip keyword allow you to activate a variety of #yEquipment. NL Every time you play a card your equipment's #ydurability decreases and applies an interesting effect. NL NL The bubbles on the Equipment Gauge show the durability of the current #yEquipment.
Playing an #yEquipment with another already equipped combines them to form something much more powerful.
When an equipment has no durability left NL it is #rdestroyed and ceases to function. NL Cards with #bNeon do not consume durability.
